segments.text: Good afternoon . What service do you require ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to rent a safety deposit box here , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For what purpose exactly , if you don't mind me asking ? I must ask because I need to know the size , you see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . My husband bought me some beautiful jewellery for our anniversary and I don't feel safe keeping it in the house . Initially , on the advice of a friend , I stored it in the freezer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a lovely gift . Yes , I can understand why you wouldn't be comfortable keeping something so valuable at home . I think one of our small ones will be perfect . Do you have some ID with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , right here . So , we can do this today , then ? That will definitely ease my mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , just fill in this form , please .
segments.speaker: S1
